body.name: GOPIE Micro ATX PC Case, X03 White mid Tower Computer Chassis with 270° Panoramic Tempered Glass, Gaming Desktop pc Hosting case Compatible with 360mm RAD -Support MATX/ITX Mobo - Fan not Included
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 20 mins
features: 【270° Panoramic Dual-Chamber Design】GOPIE micro ATX pc case features two pieces pamoramic tempered glass for the ultimate display of components. Dual-chamber design separates the cables, storage and PSU from other components to maintain a clean view and maximise airflow to the GPU.

【Mid Tower Case with Powerful Space Layout】GOPIE X03 computer case is divided in an orderly manner, each space is skillfully laid out, due to strong compatibility. The gaming pc case is installed without any obstacles, PC assemblers can carry out various DIY according to favorites, enjoy charm of game.

【Strong Internal Component Compatibility】Compatible with most of mainstream hardware in the market, support Micro ATX, ITX mainboard, GPU up to 400mm (15.75"), CPU cooling height up to 160mm, support top mounting up to 360mm liquid cooler, side mounting up to 240mm RAD, support PSU up to 200mm (7.87").

【High-Performance Airflow for Good Dissipation】Perforated rear and top panels direct filtered air through out the computer case to cool down components. Mid tower MATX gaming case fits up to 9* 120mm cooling fans. Provides extreme cooling for the gaming case while featuring 2 magnetic dust filters on the top and bottom to reduce the dust.

【No Risk of Purchase】If you have any problems with your matx case, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Sold-by-GOPIE" on the page and we will do our best to help you! GOPIE strives to provide the best support for you!

Maintain normal ventilation, reduce dust accumulation in the case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good starter case
reviews.reviewText: Good starter case. My son really likes it. The only issue I seen was the fan mounts are a little flimsy. The case has plenty of space for cable management and it small for helps for my son's small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 6 pwm argb fans 3 reverse flow!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this case for many reasons first the price can't beat it! Especially with 6 fans included and 3 of them are reverse flow really makes the case stand out. Also has lots of room for cable management. only downside i see is no grommet for the cable routing holes but can be expected because of price. Overall great buy will recommend to all my friends!
